parameters.name: DtsInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking instance.

parameters.name: DtsJobId
parameters.description:
The ID of the data migration, data synchronization, or change tracking task.

>  You can call the [DescribeDtsJobs](~~209702~~) operation to obtain the task ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the DTS instance resides. For more information, see [List of supported regions](~~141033~~).

parameters.name: SynchronizationDirection
parameters.description:
The synchronization direction. Valid values:

*   **Forward**: Data is synchronized from the source database to the destination database.
*   **Reverse**: Data is synchronized from the destination database to the source database.

> 
*   Default value: **Forward**.
*   You can set this parameter to **Reverse** to pause the reverse synchronization task only if the topology is two-way synchronization.
